channel.title: Welcome to LongBench on LongBench
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome to LongBench on LongBench

item.title: Test Tutorial
item.description: Introduction LongBench is a comprehensive benchmarking dataset designed to fill these critical gaps. Derived from eight lung cancer cell lines with synthetic RNA spike-ins, LongBench includes bulk, single-cell, and single-nucleus RNA-seq data from three state-of-the-art long-read sequencing platforms — ONT PCR-cDNA, ONT direct RNA, and PacBio Kinnex — alongside Illumina short-read data for robust cross-platform comparisons. The LongBench dataset is a valuable resource for benchmarking and improving sequencing protocols and bioinformatics tools.

item.title: LongBench data description
item.description: Introduction LongBench isa comprehensive benchmarking dataset designed to fill these critical gaps. Derived from eight lung cancer cell lines with synthetic RNA spike-ins, LongBench includes bulk, single-cell, and single-nucleus RNA-seq data from three state-of-the-art long-read sequencing platforms — ONT PCR-cDNA, ONT direct RNA, and PacBio Kinnex — alongside Illumina short-read data for robust cross-platform comparisons. The LongBench dataset is a valuable resource for benchmarking and improving sequencing protocols and bioinformatics tools.

item.title: Contact Information
item.description: If you’re interested in learning more about the data or potential collaboration opportunities, please feel free to reach out: Dr. Yupei You – you.yu@wehi.edu.au Prof. Matt Ritchie – mritchie@wehi.edu.au For more information, visit the Ritchie Lab website.
